mapper.select: SELECT cno,cname,cmediaurl,ctime,csiteurl,cstep,gno FROM Content WHERE gno=#{gno} ORDER BY cno ASC
SELECT * FROM CourseGroup WHERE sno=(SELECT sno FROM CourseGroup WHERE gno=#{gno}) ORDER BY gno ASC
SELECT gno FROM Infoattendant WHERE mno=#{mno} AND gno=#{gno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Infoattendant(suno,mno,gno) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(suno)+1,1) FROM Infoattendant),#{mno},#{gno})
mapper.select: SELECT greno,grepoint,grename,grecontent,dbday,gretab,num FROM(SELECT greno,grepoint,grename,grecontent,dbday,gretab,rownum as num FROM(SELECT greno,grepoint,grename,grecontent,TO_CHAR(gredate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as dbday,gretab FROM courseReply WHERE gno=#{gno} ORDER BY gregroup DESC, grestep ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
